entry.title: How to Add Table of Contents to Jekyll Blog

link.title: How to Add Table of Contents to Jekyll Blog

entry.summary: In lengthy blog entries with a lot of depth, a table of contents is a useful component to include. It’s one of the most effective strategies to allow your readers to skim through your content. With headlines, it provides a good overview of the entire article. How long will it take readers to find the area that interests them the most if they don’t have that? If you’re using WordPress, you can use plugins to get it easily. However, if you are using Jekyll, use this tutorial to add a Table of Contents to your Jekyll website.
